scenario dataset — add_fair_share_columns" />

Add "fair share" columns to a scenario dataset

Source: R/add_fair_share_columns.R
add_fair_share_columns.Rd

Add "fair share" columns to a scenario dataset

add_fair_share_columns(scenario, start_year)

Arguments

scenario

A scenario dataframe like r2dii.dataraw::scenario_demo.
start_year

The start year of the analysis, crucial for calculating the correct initial sector total.

Value

A dataframe with the same groups (if any) and columns as scenario, and the additional columns:

  • tfsr - The "Technology Fair Share Ratio", used to calculate scenario efforts for high-carbon technologies. The portfolio efforts are calculated as: \(p(t) = p(0) * tfsr\), where p(0) is the technology-level value at start_year.

  • mfsp - The "Market Fair Share Percentage", used to calculate scenario efforts for low-carbon technologies. The portfolio efforts are calculated as \(p(t) = p(0) + (P(0) + mfsp\), where where p(0) and P(0) is are the technology level and sector-level value at start_year.

Examples

if (requireNamespace("r2dii.dataraw", quietly = TRUE)) {
  scenario <- r2dii.dataraw::scenario_demo
  add_fair_share_columns(scenario, start_year = 2020)
}
#> # A tibble: 1,323 x 9
#>    scenario sector     technology region  year  value units         tfsr    mfsp
#>    <chr>    <chr>      <chr>      <chr>  <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>        <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1 cps      automotive electric   global  2020  0.836 cars produc…  1    0      
#>  2 cps      automotive hybrid     global  2020 12.8   cars produc…  1    0      
#>  3 cps      automotive ice        global  2020 79.9   cars produc…  1    0

#>  5 cps      automotive hybrid     global  2021 14.3   cars produc…  1.12 0.0165

#>  7 cps      automotive electric   global  2022  1.04  cars produc…  1.24 0.00213
#>  8 cps      automotive hybrid     global  2022 15.8   cars produc…  1.24 0.0326
